The claim that Barack Obama and Hillary: The expert's verdict states that both Obama and Clinton asked Congress to authorize military force against ISIS last year.
Barack Obama has authorized more than 11: 000 targeted airstrikes against ISIS since Operation Inherent Resolve began two years ago. This fact contradicts the claim that he refuses to declare war on ISIS.
Hillary Clinton: as the Democratic nominee for president, also asked Congress to pass new legislation authorizing continued military action against ISIS. This further undermines the claim that she refuses to declare war on ISIS.
The claim that Obama and Clinton: banned oil exports" is also false. The expert's verdict clarifies that neither Obama nor Clinton had a role in imposing a decades-long ban on U.S. crude oil exports, which was lifted in late 2015.
